name: DREAM TRAIL (2023 DEMO)
description:
Home alone, Koen has no one but his best friend, Jasper, to keep him company while his Dad is away. But when pieces of a torn up letter from his father start appearing in his dreams, Koen believes he has a chance to find him. It starts off like any other normal dream adventure, until the characters in his dreams start looking a little too familiar...

T̸̀̔h̷͆̅i̵̿͊ș̵͛ ̶̖͐i̶̿͝s̶̨̎ ̶͒̌j̵̋͐u̸͎͑s̶̏̎t̸̏͂ ̶̅͐a̴̿̚ ̷̓̊b̷̚ͅȁ̷́d̷͘͝ ̷̀͗d̸̉̀r̵̐̎e̶̢͊a̸̋̒m̷̾̌.̶̌͐.̶̊̌.̴̌̕ ̶͒́b̷͒̔u̷͂͗t̸̀̚ ̶̃͆ý̶͓o̸̒͛u̷͊͂ ̵͆̕d̸̾̃ȏ̴̤n̸̔̽'̶̋͝t̴̾͒ ̷́̈w̴̘̾a̷̾̆n̷̓̊t̷͑͠ ̵̒͝t̶̊̋ǒ̷̓ ̶͝wake up.

DREAM TRAIL is an upcoming indie-RPG developed by Sockhead Studios. With colorful turn-based combat, fun characters, and a story with an encouraging message, we hope you'll take the journey with Koen down this dream trail. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

VISIT OUR SOCIAL MEDIAS FOR MORE INFO:

C̷͌̕ú̵͝r̸̀̎i̸̇̇ŏ̶͊s̸̓͘i̶̿͌t̸̑̂y̸̢̽ ̵̪͒k̶͗̅i̷͌̀l̷̅͗l̶̐̚e̷͐̍d̷̖͒ ̸́͘t̵̐̈h̴̛̎ẻ̷͘ ̵̀͘c̴̈́̍a̴͕̋t̶͗̈.̸̌́
